Monthly Statistical Bulletin (MSB)

The following functions refer to statistics published in the Monthly Statistical Bulletin.

1. Monetary and banking system

get_reserve_money() get_curr_in_circ_by_denom() get_monetary_agg() get_m3() get_m3_factors() get_bnm_stmt_assets() get_bnm_stmt_cap_lbl() get_bnm_special_funds() get_sys_stmt_assets() get_islm_stmt_assets() get_sys_stmt_cap_lbl() get_islm_stmt_cap_lbl() get_stry_lqa_req() get_liq_cov_rt() get_sys_const_cap() get_islm_const_cap() get_cc_mas() get_sys_lf_ratio() get_islm_inv() get_islm_stmt_assets_inv() get_islm_fin_inv_type() get_islm_fin_inv_concept() get_islm_fin_inv_purpose_sectors() get_islm_inv_maturity()
Monetary and banking system
get_sys_deps_type() get_islm_deps_type_holder() get_sys_deps_holder() get_sys_dd_holder() get_sys_sav_fd_deps_holder() get_sys_repo_holder() get_sys_nid_holder() get_sys_fc_deps_holder() get_sys_fd_maturity()
Monetary and banking system: deposits

Monetary and banking system: conventional loans and Islamic financing
